item.title: Trees in Car Park area need Straps Removed, 14th April
item.description:
Lidl Bishops Cleeve GL528NF - The young trees planted in the Car Park area, have plant supports. These supports are attached using straps which are now cutting into the trees and will kill them unless removed now.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Evesham Road, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 14th April
item.description:
Customer has called and would like to make us aware of some concern of dead and dangerous looking trees in this area and may need inspection. 11484558 relates to PROW enquiry on bridle path side.
Report on FixMyStreet
